detail_desc: Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and long sleeves. Opening at the back with a concealed zip at the bottom and a concealed button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and a fitted skirt.

Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and long sleeves. Opening at the back with a concealed zip at the bottom and a concealed button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and a fitted skirt.
Slightly shorter, gently fitted, long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a soft, brushed finish.

Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, jacquard-knit organic cotton. Straps with adjustable buttoning at the front, and ribbed hems.

Baby Exclusive. Two-piece set with a shirt and pair of trousers in an organic cotton weave. Shirt with buttons down the front and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Trousers with an elasticated waist, decorative button fly, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Baby Exclusive. Dress knitted in soft organic cotton with buttons at the back of the neck and cable-knit details. Round flounce on the shoulders, long sleeves, a seam at the hips and a gently flared skirt.

Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton velvet with buttons at the back, a seam at the hips with a small frill trim, and a skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. Organic cotton lining.
Short dress in woven fabric with a smocked turtle neck and smocked yoke. Long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.

Cap in a patterned weave with an appliqué at the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Sweatband in woven fabric.

Hat in braided straw with a string band, small motif on the brim and a frayed edge.

Oversized jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Adjustable tabs at the sides and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Cropped jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, welt side pockets, and tabs with press-studs at the sides. Relaxed fit. The jacket is made partly from recycled cotton.
Knee-length skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, coin pocket, front and back pockets and slit at the back.

Set with a short-sleeved jersey Henley top and twill pair of shorts. Top with a button placket and a small fabric appliqué above the hem. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a back pocket.
